H0.text: Who played 'Callan' in the TV series of the same name. Edward Woodward

H1.text: Who played 'Callan' in the TV series of the same name. Patrick Macnee

H2.text: Who played 'Callan' in the TV series of the same name. Roger Moore

H3.text: Who played 'Callan' in the TV series of the same name. Ewar Woowar

A4.text: He came to wider attention from 1967 in the title role of the British television spy drama Callan, earning him the 1970 British Academy Television Award for Best Actor.

A5.text: In 1967, Woodward was cast as David Callan in the ITV Armchair Theatre play A Magnum for Schneider, which later became the spy series Callan, one of his early television roles.
